title: Add a TV/CRT frame overlay to the Play screen emulator display

requirements.text: Add a TV/CRT-style display element to the emulator area on the Play screen by wrapping the existing <canvas> display in a TV frame/overlay, while keeping all current behaviors (ROM upload overlay, error overlay, canvas sizing) working.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Play screen, the emulator display visually appears inside a TV/CRT frame (overlay) around the existing canvas.
The ROM upload overlay ("No ROM loaded" + file picker) and error overlay still appear above the canvas content and remain readable/clickable.
The TV/CRT frame scales responsively with the existing aspect-video container and does not distort the canvas rendering.
The overlay does not intercept pointer events intended for the ROM upload controls (i.e., frame overlay uses pointer-events: none where appropriate).

requirements.text: Add the generated TV/CRT frame image asset to the app as a static file under frontend/public/assets/generated and render it in the Play screen emulator display container.
acceptanceCriteria: A new TV/CRT frame PNG exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/crt-tv-frame.dim_1600x900.png.
PlayScreen uses the static generated asset path (/assets/generated/crt-tv-frame.dim_1600x900.png) to render the frame overlay.
No backend changes are required for the TV/CRT frame display.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo (no additional backend services).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose them instead).
Do not edit immutable hook entrypoints listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x), frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Adding new emulator functionality (audio/video emulation changes, performance tuning, shader-based CRT effects).
Adding new settings toggles for the TV frame unless explicitly requested later.

required: TV/CRT frame overlay with bezel, subtle reflections, and screen cutout transparency (crt-tv-frame.dim_1600x900.png)
